name: Bound Together (Willy)
description:
Our puzzle game is simple, you have two squares and one goal: bring them to the finish point with the same movements combinaison on theses two squares.

It fits the theme because, as I said, you control two square with same keys.

Musics used in the game:

https://www.dl-sounds.com/royalty-free/no-monkey/
https://www.dl-sounds.com/royalty-free/off-limits/

Credits:

  • Antony DERACHE
  • Axel RENARD
  • Quentin PORTET
  • Thomas PAQUES
  • William GAUDFRIN
